title: 512 MB weekly
info: 1 GB Internet for 7 days at the price of 55 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *477*55*1#.

title: 1 GB weekly
info: 1 GB Internet for 7 days at the price of 110 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *477*3*1#.

title: 1.5 GB weekly
info: 1.5 GB Internet for 7 days at the price of 140 Afghani. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*140*1# to activate.

title: 2.5 GB weekly
info: 1.5 GB of Internet for 7 days at the price of 210 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*210*1# to activate.
